definition: simple home-style meal/common occurrence/nothing out of the ordinary

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards

sentences.english: Over-night fame has become a common phenomenon in our modern society.
sentences.chinese: 一夜成名成了现代社会的家常便饭。

sentences.english: Peter, you should have told them it’s only a little supper.
sentences.chinese: 彼得，你应该告诉他们这只是一顿家常便饭。

sentences.english: We have the old system during rewrite, so chaos is constant.
sentences.chinese: 我们重写旧的系统，因此混乱是家常便饭。

sentences.english: Nowadays you have a game Saturday, Tuesday, Saturday, Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 现在一周双赛是家常便饭。

sentences.english: We've had a lot of coups in my country too.
sentences.chinese: 在我的国家里政变也是家常便饭。

sentences.english: The pre-race inquiries have become as routine as the postrace drug screens.
sentences.chinese: 赛前质询已经像赛后药检一样是家常便饭了。

sentences.english: Put on the table, it is a common practice in the ordinary vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 摆在饭桌上，则是家常便饭中的普通菜。

sentences.english: Of course disciplining our children is a given in any home.
sentences.chinese: 当然了，教导孩子在任何家庭中都是家常便饭了。

sentences.english: Yet Miss Politkovskaya was often threatened with death.
sentences.chinese: 然而，死亡威胁对安娜而言是家常便饭。

sentences.english: Being stopped by militsiya was a regular occurrence.
sentences.chinese: 被警察拦住问话是家常便饭。

sentences.english: In the streets of Athens, demonstrations have become everyday occurrences.
sentences.chinese: 在雅典街头，游行示威已成为家常便饭。

sentences.english: In India, recriminations after the Mumbai attacks have been rife.
sentences.chinese: 在印度，孟买袭击以后的互相指责成了家常便饭。

sentences.english: So having scorched thighs is becoming commonplace amongst the techie set.
sentences.chinese: 待在这些零件附近，大腿烫得像焦了一般是家常便饭。

definition: a small appetizer/a piece of cake; very easy (idiom)
easily/readily/frequently/at every turn/at the slightest pretext
to keep one's calm in the face of the unexpected/not to wonder at strange sights
lit. twice every three days (idiom); practically every day/frequently
lit. an easy drive on a familiar path (idiom); fig. experience makes progress easy/a task that is so familiar one can do it with one's hand tied behind one's back
